channel.title: hong on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in hong on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-06
item.description: Didi says it will delist from the U.S. and prepare to list in Hong Kong (2 minute read) Didi will start delisting from the New York Stock Exchange and will list in Hong Kong instead.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-24
item.description: Nintendo Switch Online is getting an ‘expansion pack’ with N64 and Genesis games (1 minute read) The Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack will let Nintendo Switch Online members play Nintendo 64 and Sega Genesis games.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-04
item.description: Ant Group’s record $34.5 billion IPO in Shanghai and Hong Kong is suspended (3 minute read) Ant Group’s world record-setting initial public offering has been suspended.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-07
item.description: Trump signs orders banning US business with TikTok owner ByteDance and Tencent’s WeChat (4 minute read) President Donald Trump has signed an executive order banning transactions with ByteDance and WeChat.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-07
item.description: Secretive data startup Palantir has confidentially filed for an IPO (2 minute read) Palantir is a secretive data and analytics startup that provides technologies to clients such as the US government.
